actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 1004 of the Demonstration Cities and Metropolitan Development Act of 1966.

summary.text: Amends the Demonstration Cities and Metropolitan Development Act of 1966 to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make loans and grants on the basis of need directly to Alaskan regional native housing authorities (in lieu of the State of Alaska) for the purpose of providing planning assistance, housing rehabilitation, and adequate administrative structures.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1004 of the Demonstration Cities and Metropolitan Development Act of 1966.
